unnormalised: Crop insurance, crucial for our kisan bhaiyon! Heard many got payouts in Maharashtra after that crazy rain on 20/07/2023. My uncle Ramlal in UP says Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helped him recover after the hailstorm on 10/03/2023. Wish the process was faster though, sometimes takes months, almost till Diwali! Need easier claim settlement. And maybe better coverage for mango farmers near Malihabad. Heard some faced issues even though they paid premium before 15/06/2022. Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, crucial for our kisan bhaiyon! Heard many got payouts in Maharashtra after that crazy rain on twentieth july two thousand and twenty three. My uncle Ramlal in U P says Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helped him recover after the hailstorm on tenth march two thousand and twenty three. Wish the process was faster though, sometimes takes months, almost till Diwali! Need easier claim settlement. And maybe better coverage for mango farmers near Malihabad. Heard some faced issues even though they paid premium before fifteenth june two thousand and twenty two. Jai Kisan!
